alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 31 at 2:21PM MST until February 03 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected with heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie County and South Laramie Range and Foothills including Cheyenne and Vedauwoo. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult along portions of Interstate 80 and 25. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
